name: AP_CLAIM_AUTH_ASGN_AUTHS
description:
Manually assigned service-level authorizations for the services in the PX_WITH_ASGN_AUTHS table.


See PX_WITH_ASGN_AUTHS table for instructions.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: The manually assigned service-level authorizations for the specified services.
